captions.text: O oppressed one: rest assured, justice will always prevail:
O oppressed one: rest assured, justice will always prevail:
O oppressor: your day is coming, when you will gulp down the chalice of affliction and pain.
O oppressed one: rest assured, justice will always prevail:
O oppressor: your day is coming, when you will gulp down the chalice of affliction and pain.
O oppressed one: it’s over… so what do you expect from the people?
It is an age of fear where the meek are walked all over.
But we complain only to the Lord, so fear not when you are with Him.
Patience! He is Mighty,
All-Seeing, All-Knowing, and He never forgets.
O oppressed one: rest assured, justice will always prevail:
O oppressor: your day is coming, when you will gulp down the chalice of affliction and pain.
Where to now, O oppressor? Even if lived two lifetimes,
One day you will die and in front of God you will pay your dues.
Tomorrow there’s a judgment, without any kin or loved ones to help you:
In the end, it’s all gone,
You discovered that all you've built is false hope.
O oppressed one: rest assured, justice will always prevail:
O oppressor: your day is coming, when you will gulp down the chalice of affliction and pain.
One day we will all be judged, we will come forth, oppressor and oppressed...
And angels; With our Lord as judge, and all wrongs will be redressed.
One day we will all be judged, we will come forth, oppressor and oppressed...
And angels; With our Lord as judge, and all wrongs will be redressed.
All that you sowed in your life you will reap in front of the people;
When everyone will see your misery, and I will raise my head high.
All that you sowed in your life you will reap in front of the people;
When everyone will see your misery, and I will raise my head high.
O oppressor: your day is coming, when you will gulp down the chalice of affliction and pain.
O oppressed one: rest assured, justice will always prevail:
O oppressor: your day is coming, when you will gulp down the chalice of affliction and pain.
O oppressed one: rest assured, justice will always prevail:
O oppressor: your day is coming, when you will gulp down the chalice of affliction and pain.

title: Hamza Namira - Ya Mazloum | حمزة نمرة - يا مظلوم
